0.name: FallenDown
0.rockstarDescription: decides whether to ik rotate body to match ground angle

1.name: DontRenderThisFrame
1.rockstarDescription: force ped to stop rendering this frame (for example - drive task can stop peds rendering inside buses)

5.name: BlockMovementAnims
5.rockstarDescription: completely disable processing of on-foot movement anim blending for this frame

6.name: ZeroDesiredMoveBlendRatios
6.rockstarDescription: zero out all inputs to movement system this frame, causing ped to stop moving

7.name: DontChangeMbrInSimpleMoveDoNothing
7.rockstarDescription: If this is set, then CTaskSimpleMoveDoNothing will not reset desired moveblendratio to zero this frame.

8.name: FollowingRoute
8.rockstarDescription: whether this ped is following a route of some sort - used to let simplest goto task pull the ped back onto their current route segment

9.name: TakingRouteSplineCorner
9.rockstarDescription: whether the ped is cornering via a spline curve, which will take them off their route linesegment

11.name: ProcessPhysicsTasks
11.rockstarDescription: do we need to call process physics for (main) tasks this frame

12.name: ProcessPreRender2
12.rockstarDescription: do we need to call ProcessPreRender2 for tasks

14.name: FiringWeapon
14.rockstarDescription: set when ped fires any weapon, so script can check the flag

15.name: SearchingForCover
15.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped is likely to be searching for cover, used by the navmesh to load coverpoints around interested peds

16.name: KeepCoverPoint
16.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped wants to keep their current cover point this frame, otherwise it gets released

17.name: IsClimbing
17.rockstarDescription: If the ped is climbing, shimmying or on a ladder.  Stops ProcessProbes() from happening.

19.name: IsLanding
19.rockstarDescription: is landing after being in the air

20.name: CullExtraFarAway
20.rockstarDescription: flag Ai can set to make ped get culled further away (used for roadblock cops, crimials...)

23.name: TaskUseKinematicPhysics
23.rockstarDescription: For use by tasks - puts the ped into Kinematic physics mode. In this mode the ped will push other objects our of the way, but not be physically affected by them

25.name: DoNotClampFootIk
25.rockstarDescription: Stop clamping the foot IK. Maybe the clamps should be parameters of the IK manager, but apparently that is to be refactored in future

31.name: PatrollingInVehicle
31.rockstarDescription: ped is patrolling in a vehicle, likely meaning they are swat or police

34.name: IsWalkingRoundPlayer
34.rockstarDescription: Whether this ped is walking around another ped (one frame latency)

37.name: AmbientAnimsBlocked
37.rockstarDescription: Blocks new ambient idles from starting.

42.name: ApplyVelocityDirectly
42.rockstarDescription: Should we apply the velocity directly to the physics collider or go through the force solver?

44.name: ResetMoveGroupAfterRagdoll
44.rockstarDescription: If true, will reset the temp anim group when not ragdolling

45.name: DisablePedConstraints
45.rockstarDescription: Allow the ped to rotate around freely

46.name: DisablePlayerJumping
46.rockstarDescription: Disables player jumping if true. Reset in ResetPostPhysics, as it will be set via script

47.name: DisablePlayerVaulting
47.rockstarCodeComment: Disable climbing / vaulting (but not auto-vault, that's a seperate flag).

48.name: DisableAsleepImpulse
48.rockstarDescription: Disable the code that pushes peds which fall asleep in the air

55.name: AllowUpdateIfNoCollisionLoaded
55.rockstarCodeComment: Don't freeze this ped for not having bounds loaded around it

57.name: PlacingCharge
57.rockstarDescription: Setting Bomb (firing weapon is set also)

58.name: ScriptDisableSecondaryAnimationTasks
58.rockstarDescription: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims
58.rockstarCodeComment: Disable upper body animtion tasks such as shove ped and open door anims

60.name: SearchingForDoors
60.rockstarCodeComment: Will check for the closest door in proximity and store it off

62.name: SupressGunfireEvents
62.rockstarCodeComment: Supresses AI generating fire events, so civilians wont be shocked or react, for use in a shooting range for example

63.name: InfiniteStamina
63.rockstarDescription: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina
63.rockstarCodeComment: Currently just for mounts, but could be expanded to anything with stamina

64.name: BlockWeaponReactionsUnlessDead
64.rockstarDescription: Stops ragdoll and nm behaviors triggering from weapon damage unless the ped has died.
64.rockstarCodeComment: Stops the ped from reacting to damage events (such as shots / fires, etc). The ped will still take damage while this flag is active. Note: this does not block explosion reactions.

65.name: ForcePlayerFiring
65.rockstarCodeComment: Forces player to fire even if they aren't pressing fire

66.name: InCoverFacingLeft
66.rockstarDescription: set when exiting the cover state saying if we are facing left

67.name: ForcePeekFromCover
67.rockstarDescription: if set the ped will go into peeking if they are already in cover
67.rockstarCodeComment: Forces an actor that is in cover to continue (or start if they haven't yet) peeking

68.name: NotAllowedToChangeCrouchState
68.rockstarDescription: if set the ped will not be allowed to change their crouch state

70.name: ForceMeleeStrafingAnims
70.rockstarDescription: forces a ped to use the melee strafing anims when strafing

71.name: UseKinematicPhysics
71.rockstarDescription: To be used by scripts - puts the ped into Kinematic physics mode. In this mode the ped will push other objects our of the way, but not be physically affected by them
71.rockstarCodeComment: Enables kinematic physics mode on this ped. This stops other physical objects from pushing the ped around, and causes the ped to push any physical objects out of its way when it moves into them.

72.name: ClearLockonTarget
72.rockstarDescription: Clears the player's lockon target next frame
72.rockstarCodeComment: Clear the players lockon target next frame

73.name: CanPedSeeHatedPedBeingUsed
73.rockstarDescription: Activates can ped see hated ped generating events even when blocking of non-temp events is on

74.name: InstantBlendToAim
74.rockstarDescription: Makes the ped performa an instant blend to aim if starting a gun task this frame

75.name: ForceImprovedIdleTurns
75.rockstarDescription: Forces the ped to use an improved idle turning system that should help him turn to face more quickly

76.name: HitPedWithWeapon
76.rockstarDescription: set when damage is inflicted by this ped on another ped

77.name: ForcePedToUseScripCamHeading
77.rockstarDescription: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay
77.rockstarCodeComment: forces a ped to the scripted camera heading instead of gameplay

78.name: ProcessProbesWhenExtractingZ
78.rockstarDescription: makes the capsule physics push the ped out of the ground even when extracting z

79.name: KeepDesiredCoverPoint
79.rockstarDescription: should the ped keep their desired cover point this frame

80.name: HasProcessedCornering
80.rockstarDescription: whether the ped has already processed slowing down for this corner

81.name: StandingOnForkliftForks
81.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped standing capsule hits the forklift forks.

82.name: AimWeaponReactionRunning
82.rockstarDescription: ped is running the reaction task this frame

83.name: InContactWithFoliage
83.rockstarDescription: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds

84.name: ForceExplosionCollisions
84.rockstarDescription: ped will always collide with explosions, even when collision is off

85.name: IgnoreTargetsCoverForLOS
85.rockstarDescription: when checking LOS against targets this ped will ignore their cover (if the cover exists)
85.rockstarCodeComment: When doing LOS checks to other peds we won't use the cover vantage position as the "target" position

86.name: BlockAnimatedWeaponReactions
86.rockstarDescription: Ped should not play animated damager reactions while this flag is set

87.name: DisablePedCapsule
87.rockstarDescription: Removes the ped capsule from the physics simulation

88.name: DisableCrouchWhileInCover
88.rockstarDescription: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.
88.rockstarCodeComment: Force the crouch flag to return true while in cover.

89.name: IncreasedAvoidanceRadius
89.rockstarDescription: Adds extra 2m onto the radius other peds use to avoid this ped during local steering.

91.name: ForceRunningSpeedForFragSmashing
91.rockstarDescription: Can be set by designers to force the ped to smash more easily through frags.
91.rockstarCodeComment: Forces a ped to apply forces to frags as if running on contact, to guarantee peds will smash through frag objects when playing custom anims

92.name: EnableMoverAnimationWhileAttached
92.rockstarDescription: While flagged, any mover animation will be applied to the offset of the attachment.

93.name: NoTimeDelayBeforeShot
93.rockstarDescription: While flagged, The time delay before a player can fire after aiming is 0

94.name: SearchingForAutoVaultClimb
94.rockstarDescription: inform climb code we are doing an autovault

95.name: ExtraLongWeaponRange
95.rockstarDescription: Extends the range of a peds weapons to 250m
95.rockstarCodeComment: Force the bullets gun range to increase to 250m

96.name: ForcePlayerToEnterVehicleThroughDirectDoorOnly
96.rockstarDescription: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles
96.rockstarCodeComment: Forces the player to only use direct access when entering vehicles

97.name: TaskCullExtraFarAway
97.rockstarDescription: Can be set by ai tasks on the main task tree to disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle.
97.rockstarCodeComment: Disable a ped getting cull from a vehicle from pretend occupants.

98.name: IsVaulting
98.rockstarDescription: Set the entire time CTaskVault is running.

99.name: IsParachuting
99.rockstarDescription: Set the entire time CTaskParachute is running.

100.name: SuppressSlowingForCorners
100.rockstarDescription: If set this will prevent the ped from slowing down to take corners this frame

102.name: DisablePlayerAutoVaulting
102.rockstarCodeComment: If this flag is set on a ped it will not attempt to autovault

106.name: JayWalking
106.rockstarDescription: If set then the ped is jay walking and a vehicle is allowed to run him over.

107.name: UseBulletPenetration
107.rockstarDescription: Ped will use bullet penetration code.
107.rockstarCodeComment: If this flag is set on a ped it will use the bullet shoot through code

108.name: ForceAimAtHead
108.rockstarDescription: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped
108.rockstarCodeComment: Force all attackers to target the head of this ped

109.name: IsInStationaryScenario
109.rockstarDescription: In a scenario and not moving
109.rockstarCodeComment: Inform avoidance code that this ped isn't going anywhere and should be steered around rather than waited for

112.name: DisableSeeThroughChecksWhenTargeting
112.rockstarDescription: Any targeting LoS checks will fail if any materials with 'see through' materials found.
112.rockstarCodeComment: Any targeting LoS checks will fail if any materials with 'see through' materials found.

113.name: PuttingOnHelmet
113.rockstarCodeComment: When set, the ped is putting on a helmet. DONT SET THIS only query it

114.name: AllowPullingPedOntoRoute
114.rockstarDescription: allows goto task to apply heading in order to pull a ped back onto their route

115.name: ApplyAnimatedVelocityWhilstAttached
115.rockstarDescription: Allows attachment offsets to be updated from animated velocities

117.name: ResponseAfterScenarioPanic
117.rockstarDescription: The ped is entering threat response after panic exiting a scenario.

118.name: IsNearDoor
118.rockstarDescription: Ped is near a non-vehicle door

120.name: PanicInVehicle
120.rockstarCodeComment: When set, the ped will play panic animations if in a vehicle

121.name: DisableDynamicCapsuleRadius
121.rockstarDescription: Turn off dynamic adjustments to ped capsules

122.name: IsRappelling
122.rockstarDescription: Is currently in a rappel task

123.name: SkipReactInReactAndFlee
123.rockstarDescription: When this ped goes to ThreatResponse, play the flee transition but not the reaction clip if fleeing.

124.name: CannotBeTargeted
124.rockstarDescription: Will prevent this ped from being a part of any other peds target list
124.rockstarCodeComment: When set, this ped cannot be added to the targeting list of AI peds, will be removed if already in the list and is thought of as not able to be attacked

125.name: IsFalling
125.rockstarDescription: Ped is in pure fall state (i.e. no parachuting, landing etc included

126.name: ForceInjuryAfterStunned
126.rockstarDescription: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned
126.rockstarCodeComment: Forces this ped to the injured state after being stunned

127.name: HurtThisFrame
127.rockstarDescription: The ped has entered the hurt state this frame

128.name: BlockWeaponFire
128.rockstarDescription: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon
128.rockstarCodeComment: Prevent the ped from shooting a weapon

129.name: ExpandPedCapsuleFromSkeleton
129.rockstarDescription: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton
129.rockstarCodeComment: Set the ped capsule radius based on skeleton

130.name: DisableWeaponLaserSight
130.rockstarDescription: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame
130.rockstarCodeComment: Toggle the weapon laser sight off for this frame

131.name: PedExitedVehicleThisFrame
131.rockstarDescription: Set when ped gets set out of vehicle

132.name: SearchingForDropDown
132.rockstarDescription: Ped is seatching for drop down

133.name: UseTighterTurnSettings
133.rockstarDescription: Ped should use tighter turn settings in human locomotion motion task

134.name: DisableArmSolver
134.rockstarDescription: Disable the arm solver this frame

139.name: TasksNeedProcessMoveSignalCalls
139.rockstarDescription: Set when peds require calls to ProcessMoveSignals(), for AI timeslicing to work with Move

141.name: NoCollisionMovementMode
141.rockstarDescription: Set when a ped is moving in an area where collisions with fixed geometry are unlikely.  The ped's physics will not be forced to activate.

142.name: IsNearLaddder
142.rockstarDescription: Ped is near top of a ladder

144.name: IgnoredByAutoOpenDoors
144.rockstarDescription: Set this for a ped to be ignored by the auto opened doors when checking to see if the door should be opened.

145.name: BlockIkWeaponReactions
145.rockstarDescription: Ped should not play Ik damager reactions while this flag is set

146.name: FirstPhysicsUpdate
146.rockstarDescription: Ped was just created this frame

149.name: SuspendInitiatedMeleeActions
149.rockstarDescription: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely
149.rockstarCodeComment: Temporarily suspend any melee actions this frame (does not include hit reactions). Use PCF_DisableMelee to turn it off completely

150.name: SuppressInAirEvent
150.rockstarDescription: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame
150.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped from getting the in air event the next frame

151.name: AllowTasksIncompatibleWithMotion
151.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will skip CheckTasksAreCompatibleWithMotion
151.rockstarCodeComment: If set, allows ped to have tasks incompatible with its current motion

154.name: HasGunTaskWithAimingState
154.rockstarDescription: Ped is running TASK_GUN and task's state is State_Aim

155.name: SuppressLethalMeleeActions
155.rockstarDescription: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)
155.rockstarCodeComment: This will suppress any melee action that is considered lethal (RA_IS_LETHAL, defined in action_table.meta)

156.name: InstantBlendToAimFromScript
156.rockstarCodeComment: Blend straight into an aim instantly, if starting a gun task this frame

163.name: AmbientIdleAndBaseAnimsBlocked
163.rockstarDescription: Blocks ambient idles and base animations from playing.

164.name: UseAlternativeWhenBlock
164.rockstarDescription: If set, ped will use alternative aiming/firing anims

165.name: ForceLowLodWaterCheck
165.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will always force probe for being in water when in low LOD mode.

166.name: MakeHeadInvisible
166.rockstarDescription: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001
166.rockstarCodeComment: If set, scale the head of the ped to 0.001

167.name: NoAutoRunWhenFiring
167.rockstarDescription: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set.
167.rockstarCodeComment: Don't auto run when NoAutoRunWhenFiring is set

168.name: PermitEventDuringScenarioExit
168.rockstarDescription: Ignore certain aspects (FOV checks, etc) of AffectsPedCore() on some events while the ped is playing a scenario exit.

169.name: DisableSteeringAroundVehicles
169.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around vehicles

170.name: DisableSteeringAroundPeds
170.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around peds

171.name: DisableSteeringAroundObjects
171.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around objects

172.name: DisableSteeringAroundNavMeshEdges
172.rockstarDescription: Enables/disables the low-level steering behaviour around nav mesh edges
172.rockstarCodeComment: Don't let this ped take navmesh edges into account when performing their low-level steering/avoidance code

177.name: DisableTakeOffParachutePack
177.rockstarCodeComment: Disable taking off the parachute pack

179.name: ForceCombatTaunt
179.rockstarDescription: Forces a combat taunt for peds using the insult special ability.
179.rockstarCodeComment: If this ped has the INSULT special ability, and this flag is set, he will always use the combat taunt when the special is activated

180.name: IgnoreCombatTaunts
180.rockstarCodeComment: This ped will ignore combat taunts

181.name: SkipAiUpdateProcessControl
181.rockstarDescription: True if we've already run this ped's AI and can skip it from within ProcessControl

182.name: OverridePhysics
182.rockstarDescription: A reset flag that disables collision and gravity on the ped and drives entity positions and rotations directly, rather than going through the physics update.

183.name: WasPhysicsOverridden
183.rockstarDescription: True if physics was overriden during the last update.

184.name: BlockWeaponHoldingAnims
184.rockstarDescription: Block any onfoot weapon holding anims.

185.name: DisableMoveTaskHeadingAdjustments
185.rockstarDescription: True if the ped's movement task should not adjust the heading of the ped.

187.name: PreventAllMeleeTakedowns
187.rockstarDescription: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped
187.rockstarCodeComment: Will temporarily prevent any takedown from being performed on this ped

188.name: PreventFailedMeleeTakedowns
188.rockstarDescription: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedowns from being performed on this ped
188.rockstarCodeComment: Will temporarily prevent any failed takedown from being performed on this ped

190.name: UseTighterAvoidanceSettings
190.rockstarDescription: Ped should use tighter avoidance settings in navigation task
190.rockstarCodeComment: Will temporarily force min avoidance on this ped.  will brush other peds but avoid a bit

191.name: IsHigherPriorityClipControllingPed
191.rockstarDescription: True if the active task on the main task tree is taking responsibility for the mover track

192.name: VehicleCrushingRagdoll
192.rockstarDescription: Set to true if a vehicle is pressing downward on the ragdoll

193.name: OnActivationUpdate
193.rockstarDescription: Ped was just activated this frame

194.name: ForceMotionStateLeaveDesiredMBR
194.rockstarDescription: Set this to disable setting the desired move blendratio when forcing the motion state. Usefull for forcing a flee start, etc

195.name: DisableDropDowns
195.rockstarDescription: Disable drop downs for this ped
195.rockstarCodeComment: Disable drop downs for this ped

196.name: InContactWithBIGFoliage
196.rockstarDescription: ped is in contact with GTA_FOLIAGE_TYPE bounds that are large and the player can be hidden

197.name: DisableTakeOffScubaGear
197.rockstarCodeComment: Disable taking off the scuba gear

198.name: DisableCellphoneAnimations
198.rockstarDescription: tells taskmobile phone to Blends out move network and prevents it from blending in

202.name: TouchingOverhang
202.rockstarDescription: Some part appears to be contrained downwards

203.name: TooSteepForPlayer
203.rockstarDescription: We're standing on something flagged too steep for the player to stand on

204.name: BlockSecondaryAnim
204.rockstarDescription: Block any secondary scripted task animations playing on this ped

205.name: IsInCombat
205.rockstarDescription: This ped is running the combat task

206.name: UseHeadOrientationForPerception
206.rockstarDescription: Will use the ped's head orientation for perception tests
206.rockstarCodeComment: Use the ped's head orientation for perception tests

207.name: IsDoingDriveby
207.rockstarDescription: This ped is running a driveby gun or projectile task

208.name: IsEnteringCover
208.rockstarDescription: This ped is running a cover entry task

209.name: ForceMovementScannerCheck
209.rockstarDescription: Set to make CStaticMovementScanner::Scan() check for collisions as if we were moving

210.name: DisableJumpRagdollOnCollision
210.rockstarDescription: If true, the player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping
210.rockstarCodeComment: The player will no longer auto-ragdoll when colliding with objects, peds, etc. while jumping

211.name: IsBeingMeleeHomedByPlayer
211.rockstarDescription: Set on the target ped in melee if the player is homing towards them

212.name: ShouldLaunchBicycleThisFrame
212.rockstarDescription: This ped should launch the bicycle this frame

213.name: CanDoBicycleWheelie
213.rockstarDescription: This ped can do a bicycle wheelie

214.name: ForceProcessPhysicsUpdateEachSimStep
214.rockstarDescription: If true, ProcessPhysics() will execute completely for each physics simulation step

215.name: DisablePedCapsuleMapCollision
215.rockstarDescription: Disables collision between the ped capsule and the map (usefull in cases where the entity position is being tightly controlled outside of physics, e.g. by an animation)

216.name: DisableSeatShuffleDueToInjuredDriver
216.rockstarDescription: If true, motion in vehicle task won't shuffle to the driver seat just because the driver is injured

218.name: ProcessPostMovement
218.rockstarDescription: do we need to call ProcessPostMovement for tasks

219.name: ProcessPostCamera
219.rockstarDescription: do we need to call ProcessPostCamera for tasks

220.name: ProcessPostPreRender
220.rockstarDescription: do we need to call ProcessPostPreRender for tasks

222.name: KeepParachutePackOnAfterTeleport
222.rockstarCodeComment: Keep the parachute pack on after a teleport

223.name: DontRaiseFistsWhenLockedOn
223.rockstarCodeComment: Whether or not you want the player ped to use the new front melee logic in TODO #981120

224.name: PreferMeleeBodyIkHitReaction
224.rockstarDescription1: This will prefer all melee hit reactions to use body ik hit reactions if ragdoll is not selected
224.rockstarCodeComment: This will prefer all melee hit reactions to use body ik hit reactions if ragdoll is not selected

225.name: ProcessPhysicsTasksMotion
225.rockstarDescription: do we need to call process physics for motion tasks this frame

226.name: ProcessPhysicsTasksMovement
226.rockstarDescription: do we need to call process physics for movement tasks this frame

227.name: DisableFriendlyGunReactAudio
227.rockstarDescription: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.
227.rockstarCodeComment: If set, disables friendly responses to gunshots/being aimed at.

229.name: ForceForwardTransitionInReactAndFlee
229.rockstarDescription: If set, force CTaskReactAndFlee to use a forward facing flee transition

231.name: DoNotSkipNavMeshTrackerUpdate
231.rockstarDescription: If set we will not allow the NavMeshTracker update to be skipped this frame.

232.name: RagdollOnVehicle
232.rockstarDescription: Set to true when the ragdoll is lying on top of a vehicle (note- hands, feet, forearms and shins are not included in the test)

234.name: DisableNMForRiverRapids
234.rockstarDescription: If set, disable NM reactions to fast moving water
234.rockstarCodeComment: Disable NM reactions to fast moving water for this ped

235.name: IsInWrithe
235.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped is on the ground writhing and might start shooting from ground

236.name: PreventGoingIntoStillInVehicleState
236.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose
236.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will not go into the still in vehicle pose

237.name: UseFastEnterExitVehicleRates
237.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster
237.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will get in and out of vehicles faster (same as in mp)

238.name: DisableGroundAttachment
238.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped won't attach to a ground physical when his physics disables (useful for cutscenes, etc)

250.name: OnlyAllowLeftArmDoorIk
250.rockstarCodeComment: When set along side open door ik, will only use the left hand

251.name: OnlyAllowRightArmDoorIk
251.rockstarCodeComment: When set along side open door ik, will only use the left hand

252.name: ForceProcessPedStandingUpdateEachSimStep
252.rockstarDescription: When set, ProcessPedStanding will get called for each physics step.

253.name: DisableFlashLight
253.rockstarDescription: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off.
253.rockstarCodeComment: When set, the flash light on a Ai weapon will be turned off

254.name: DoingCombatRoll
254.rockstarDescription: When set, the ped is doing a combat roll

256.name: CanAbortExitForInAirEvent
256.rockstarDescription: When set, the ped can abort the exit vehicle anim to go into fall

258.name: ForceEnableFlashLightForAI
258.rockstarDescription: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light
258.rockstarCodeComment: When set, the ai ped will enable their flash light

261.name: WaitingForCompletedPathRequest
261.rockstarDescription: This ped is waiting for a path request which is now complete, so their tasks must be updated this frame

266.name: EnableSteepSlopePrevention
266.rockstarDescription: Pushes the ped through the same steep slope tolerances in TaskMotionBase that the player encounters

270.name: ProcessPostMovementTimeSliced
270.rockstarDescription: Parallel flag to ProcessPostMovement, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

271.name: EnablePressAndReleaseDives
271.rockstarCodeComment: Player has to press and hold dive button to dive in water

272.name: OnlyExitVehicleOnButtonRelease
272.rockstarCodeComment: Only allows player to exit vehicle when button is released rather than pressed or held

281.name: OverrideHairScale
281.rockstarDescription: Scales the ped's hair down to the specified value

282.name: ConsiderAsPlayerCoverThreatWithoutLOS
282.rockstarDescription: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player
282.rockstarCodeComment: Considered as a threat as part of player cover search even if they can't see the player

283.name: BlockCustomAIEntryAnims
283.rockstarCodeComment: Disables ped from using custom ai cover entry animations

284.name: IgnoreVehicleEntryCollisionTests
284.rockstarCodeComment: Ignore the vehicle entry collision tests for this ped

285.name: StreamActionModeAnimsIfDisabled
285.rockstarDescription: Stream action mode anims even if action mode is disabled

286.name: ForceUpdateRagdollMatrix
286.rockstarDescription: Ped requires ragdoll matrix update next frame.

287.name: PreventGoingIntoShuntInVehicleState
287.rockstarDescription: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose
287.rockstarCodeComment: If set, the ped will not go into the shunt in vehicle pose

293.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerPedImpactReset
293.rockstarDescription: Block ragdoll activations from animated player bumps

294.name: DontActivateRagdollFromAiRagdollImpactReset
294.rockstarDescription: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with an ai ragdoll

295.name: DontActivateRagdollFromPlayerRagdollImpactReset
295.rockstarDescription: Block ragdoll activations from collisions with a player ragdoll

296.name: DisableVisemeBodyAdditive
296.rockstarDescription: If set, prevents visemes from playing any additive body animations

297.name: CapsuleBeingPushedByPlayerCapsule
297.rockstarDescription: Set when the player capsule is pushing up against this peds capsule

300.name: UsingMoverExtraction
300.rockstarDescription: Set when the players capsule is getting repositioned each frame relative to an anim and origin

302.name: EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement
302.rockstarDescription: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement
302.rockstarCodeComment: If set, turn on the voice driven mouth movement

304.name: UseTighterEnterVehicleSettings
304.rockstarDescription: Ped should use tighter (shorter) settings for entering vehicles
304.rockstarCodeComment: To have peds do better vehicle entries when in a group and interfered by other peds, use carefully though

305.name: InRaceMode
305.rockstarDescription: Set when the player is in the race mode.
305.rockstarCodeComment: Set when the player is in the races to make the player more interesting to look at.

308.name: AllowSpecialAbilityInVehicle
308.rockstarDescription: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle
308.rockstarCodeComment: Allows the player to trigger the special ability while in a vehicle

309.name: DisableInVehicleActions
309.rockstarDescription: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions such as starting engine, hotwiring, closing door etc.
309.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents ped from doing in vehicle actions like closing door, hotwiring, starting engine, putting on helmet etc

310.name: ForceInstantSteeringWheelIkBlendIn
310.rockstarDescription: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time.
310.rockstarCodeComment: Forces ped to blend in steering wheel ik instantly rather than over time

311.name: IgnoreThreatEngagePlayerCoverBonus
311.rockstarDescription: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at
311.rockstarCodeComment: Ignores the bonus score for selecting cover that the player can engage the enemy at

312.name: Block180Turns
312.rockstarDescription: Blocks triggering of 180 turns in human locomotion this frame.

313.name: DontCloseVehicleDoor
313.rockstarDescription: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're in
313.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents the ped from closing the vehicle door of the car they're inside

314.name: SkipExplosionOcclusion
314.rockstarDescription: Map collision will not block this ped from being hit by explosions
314.rockstarCodeComment: Explosions can't be blocked by map collision when damaging this ped

315.name: ProcessPhysicsTasksTimeSliced
315.rockstarDescription: Parallel flag to ProcessPhysicsTasks, except this is reset in PreTask(), meaning it stays consistent across timeslicing.

316.name: MeleeStrikeAgainstNonPed
316.rockstarDescription: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material
316.rockstarCodeComment: Set when the ped has performed a melee strike and hit any non ped material

317.name: IgnoreNavigationForDoorArmIK
317.rockstarDescription: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK
317.rockstarCodeComment: We will not attempt to walk around doors when using arm IK

319.name: DisablePedCollisionWithPedEvent
319.rockstarDescription: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped
319.rockstarCodeComment: Disable hit reaction due to colliding with a ped

320.name: IgnoreVelocityWhenClosingVehicleDoor
320.rockstarDescription: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway
320.rockstarCodeComment: Will ignore the vehicle speed threshold and close the door anyway

322.name: DontWalkRoundObjects
322.rockstarDescription: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving
322.rockstarCodeComment: Don't walk round objects that we collide with whilst moving

323.name: DisablePedEnteredMyVehicleEvents
323.rockstarCodeComment: Disable ped entered my vehicle events

324.name: CancelLeftHandGripIk
324.rockstarDescription: Call ProcessLeftHandGripIk() to cancel left hand grip IK, at the right time of the frame

325.name: ResetMovementStaticCounter
325.rockstarDescription: Will keep reset the static counter when this is set

326.name: DisableInVehiclePedVariationBlocking
326.rockstarDescription: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise
326.rockstarCodeComment: Will allow ped variations to be rendered in vehicles, even if marked otherwise

327.name: ReduceEffectOfVehicleRamControlLoss
327.rockstarDescription: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped
327.rockstarCodeComment: When on a mission this reset flag will slightly reduce the amount of time the player loses control of their vehicle when hit by an AI ped

328.name: DisablePlayerMeleeFriendlyAttacks
328.rockstarDescription: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.
328.rockstarCodeComment: Another flag to disable friendly attack from the player. Set on the opponent you would like it to be disabled on.

330.name: IsMeleeTargetUnreachable
330.rockstarDescription: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)
330.rockstarCodeComment: Set when the melee target has been deemed unreachable (AI only)

331.name: DisableAutoForceOutWhenBlowingUpCar
331.rockstarCodeComment: Disable automatically forcing player to exit a vehicle in a network game when blowing up vehicle

333.name: OverrideHairScaleLarger
333.rockstarDescription: Scales the ped's hair up to the specified value

335.name: DisableMeleeHitReactions
335.rockstarDescription: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction
335.rockstarCodeComment: This ped will refrain from ever performing a melee hit reaction

336.name: VisemeAnimsAudioBlocked
336.rockstarDescription: Blocks viseme anims audio from playing

337.name: AllowHeadPropInVehicle
337.rockstarDescription: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle
337.rockstarCodeComment: This overrides PV_FLAG_NOT_IN_CAR set on any head prop and stops it from being removed when getting into the vehicle

340.name: SetLastBoundMatricesDone
340.rockstarDescription: Ensure that the last bound matrices are only updated once per frame

341.name: PreserveAnimatedAngularVelocity
341.rockstarDescription: Don't allow the locomotion task to adjust angular velocity coming from animation

342.name: OpenDoorArmIK
342.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped should enable open door arm IK
342.rockstarCodeComment: Reset version of PCF_OpenDoorArmIK, which sets if the ped should enable open door arm IK.

343.name: UseTighterTurnSettingsForScript
343.rockstarDescription: Script set flag, to force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task
343.rockstarCodeComment: Force use of tighter turn settings in locomotion task

344.name: ForcePreCameraProcessExternallyDrivenDOFs
344.rockstarDescription: Set if the ped should process externally driven dofs before the pre-camera ai update

345.name: LadderBlockingMovement
345.rockstarDescription: Ped is waiting for ladder and blocking movement to prevent falling off

346.name: DisableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement
346.rockstarDescription: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)
346.rockstarCodeComment: If set, turn off the voice driven mouth movement (overrides EnableVoiceDrivenMouthMovement)

347.name: SteerIntoSkids
347.rockstarDescription: If set, steer into skids while driving
347.rockstarCodeComment: If set, steer into skids while driving

348.name: AllowOpenDoorIkBeforeFullMovement
348.rockstarDescription: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving
348.rockstarCodeComment: When set, code will ignore the logic that requires the ped to be in CTaskHumanLocomotion::State_Moving

349.name: AllowHomingMissileLockOnInVehicle
349.rockstarDescription: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle
349.rockstarCodeComment: When set, code will bypass rel settings and allow a homing lock on to this ped when they are in a vehicle

351.name: DisableHighHeels
351.rockstarDescription: Force the high heels DOF to be 0
351.rockstarCodeComment: Force the high heels DOF to be 0

352.name: BreakTargetLock
352.rockstarDescription: Force lock on to break for this ped

353.name: DontUseSprintEnergy
353.rockstarDescription: Player does not get tired when sprinting
353.rockstarCodeComment: Player does not get tired when sprinting

355.name: DisableMaterialCollisionDamage
355.rockstarDescription: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)
355.rockstarCodeComment: Don't be damaged by touching dangerous material (e.g. electic generator)

356.name: DisableMPFriendlyLockon
356.rockstarDescription: Don't target friendly players in MP
356.rockstarCodeComment: Don't target friendly players in MP

357.name: DisableMPFriendlyLethalMeleeActions
357.rockstarDescription: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP
357.rockstarCodeComment: Don't melee kill friendly players in MP

358.name: IfLeaderStopsSeekCover
358.rockstarDescription: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can
358.rockstarCodeComment: If our leader stops, try and seek cover if we can

359.name: ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments
359.rockstarDescription: do we need to call CPED_RESET_FLAG_ProcessPostPreRenderAfterAttachments for tasks

361.name: IsUsingJetpack
361.rockstarDescription: Is ped currently using jetpack. e.g. in air

363.name: IsClosingVehicleDoor
363.rockstarDescription: Ped is closing a vehicle door
363.rockstarCodeComment: Ped is closing a vehicle door

364.name: DisableIdleExtraHeadingChange
364.rockstarDescription: Disable lerping the ped towards the desired heading in the locomotion idle

365.name: OnlySelectVehicleWeapons
365.rockstarDescription: Only allows vehicle weapons to be selected in CPedWeaponSelector::SelectWeapon

366.name: IsWarpingIntoVehicleMP
366.rockstarDescription: Set in CTaskEnterVehicle::SetPedInSeat_OnEnter if ped is warping into a vehicle in multiplayer

367.name: RemoveHelmet
367.rockstarDescription: Forces a ped to remove its helmet.

368.name: IsRemovingHelmet
368.rockstarDescription: Returns true if ped is removing its helmet.

370.name: NeverRagdoll
370.rockstarDescription: Disable all attempts by this ped to ragdoll.

371.name: DisableWallHitAnimation
371.rockstarDescription: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame.
371.rockstarCodeComment: Disable stuck wall hit animation for the ped this frame

372.name: PlayAgitatedAnimsInVehicle
372.rockstarDescription: Play agitated anims in vehicle - overrides normal sit idle
372.rockstarCodeComment: When set, the ped will play panic animations if in a vehicle

373.name: IsSeatShuffling
373.rockstarDescription: Returns true if ped is shuffling seat.

374.name: IsThrowingProjectileWhileAiming
374.rockstarDescription: True if we are running TASK_AIM_AND_THROW_PROJECTILE as a subtask of TASK_AIM_GUN_ON_FOOT.

376.name: AllowControlRadioInAnySeatInMP
376.rockstarDescription: Allows ped in any seat to control radio in multiplayer.
376.rockstarCodeComment: Allows ped in any seat to control the radio (in MP only)

377.name: DisableSpycarTransformation
377.rockstarDescription: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes.
377.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ped from manually transforming spycar to/from car/sub modes

378.name: BlockQuadLocomotionIdleTurns
378.rockstarDescription: Prevent CTaskQuadLocomotion from blending in idle turns, regardless of desired/currenting heading differential.

379.name: BlockHeadbobbingToRadio
379.rockstarDescription: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles.
379.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks ped from headbobbing to radio music in vehicles

380.name: PlayFPSIdleFidgets
380.rockstarDescription: Allows us to load and play idle fidgets in TaskMotionAiming

381.name: ForceExtraLongBlendInForPedSkipIdleCoverTransition
381.rockstarDescription: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop
381.rockstarCodeComment: When putting a ped directly into cover, the ped will blend in the new cover anims slowly to prevent a pose pop, see B*1788366

382.name: BlendingOutFPSIdleFidgets
382.rockstarDescription: True if FPS idle fidgets are blending out

384.name: FPSSwimUseSwimMotionTask
384.rockstarDescription: Set to true when we are pressing forward on the left stick in FPS mode so we switch from Aiming to Swimmimg/Diving motion tasks

385.name: FPSSwimUseAimingMotionTask
385.rockstarDescription: Set to true when we are strafing in water in FPS mode so we use the motion aiming task

386.name: FiringWeaponWhenReady
386.rockstarDescription: set when ped has decided to fire weapon when ready, used in FPS mode

387.name: IsBlindFiring
387.rockstarDescription: True if the blind fire task is running

388.name: IsPeekingFromCover
388.rockstarDescription: True if the ped is peeking in cover

389.name: TaskSkipProcessPreComputeImpacts
389.rockstarDescription: True to bail out of ProcessPreComputeImpacts

390.name: DisableAssistedAimLockon
390.rockstarDescription: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim
390.rockstarCodeComment: Don't ever try to lock on to this ped with cinematic aim

391.name: FPSAllowAimIKForThrownProjectile
391.rockstarDescription: To control enabling of FPS aim IK while using a projectile until it is ready

393.name: ForcePreCameraAiAnimUpdateIfFirstPerson
393.rockstarDescription: Force a pre camera ai and animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

394.name: NoCollisionDamageFromOtherPeds
394.rockstarDescription: Any ped this is set on won't register damage from collisions against other peds.
394.rockstarCodeComment: Any ped this is set on won't register damage from collisions against other peds.

396.name: NeverDieFromCapsuleRagdollSettings
396.rockstarDescription: Negate the capsule's preference for ragdoll triggering death on this ped.

397.name: InContactWithDeepSurface
397.rockstarDescription: ped is in contact with GTA_DEEP_SURFACE_TYPE bounds

398.name: DontSuppressUseNavMeshToNavigateToVehicleDoorWhenVehicleInWater
398.rockstarCodeComment: For thing that inherit from boats only

399.name: IncludePedReferenceVelocityWhenFiringProjectiles
399.rockstarDescription: Add on the ped's velocity to the projectile's initial velocity.

401.name: InstantBlendToAimNoSettle
401.rockstarCodeComment: If true it avoids playing the settle anim when aiming

402.name: ForcePreCameraAnimUpdate
402.rockstarDescription: Force a pre camera animation update if the ped is the first person camera target during the pre camera update

403.name: DisableHelmetCullFPS
403.rockstarDescription: Disables PV_FLAG_HIDE_IN_FIRST_PERSON from culling the prop in CPedPropsMgr::RenderPropsInternal

406.name: ForceScriptedCameraLowCoverAngleWhenEnteringCover
406.rockstarCodeComment: For first person mode, when the player enters low cover, will orientate camera to face left or right rather than into cover

408.name: DisableFPSArmIK
408.rockstarDescription: Disables FPS arm IK in CTaskPlayerOnFoot::IsStateValidForFPSIK

409.name: DisableRightArmIKInCoverOutroFPS
409.rockstarDescription: Turn off right arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

413.name: WeaponBlockedInFPSMode
413.rockstarDescription: True if running CTaskWeaponBlocked in FPS mode

416.name: WasFPSJumpingWithProjectile
416.rockstarDescription: ped was jumping on foot with projectile in hand

418.name: WaypointPlaybackSlowMoreForCorners
418.rockstarDescription: slow for corners more aggressively for waypoint playback
418.rockstarCodeComment: Allows peds following waypoint recordings to slow down more for corners. (Achieves same effect as the EWAYPOINT_SUPPRESS_EXACTSTOP flag, which is passed into TASK_FOLLOW_WAYPOINT_RECORDING).

419.name: FPSPlacingProjectile
419.rockstarDescription: True while placing a projectile in FPS mode

420.name: UseBulletPenetrationForGlass
420.rockstarDescription: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.
420.rockstarCodeComment: Ped will use bullet penetration code when glass material is hit.

421.name: FPSPlantingBombOnFloor
421.rockstarDescription: Doing a floor plant with a bomb in FPS mode

423.name: CanBePinnedByFriendlyBullets
423.rockstarDescription: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds
423.rockstarCodeComment: If set on a ped then they are allowed to be pinned by bullets from friendly peds

424.name: DisableLeftArmIKInCoverOutroFPS
424.rockstarDescription: Turn off left arm IK during cover outros in FPS mode when set

425.name: DisableSpikeStripRoadBlocks
425.rockstarDescription: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning
425.rockstarCodeComment: Blocks road blocks with spike strips from spawning

427.name: PutDownHelmetFX
427.rockstarDescription: trigger the put down helmet fx

428.name: IsLowerPriorityMeleeTarget
428.rockstarDescription: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button
428.rockstarCodeComment: Peds marked with this flag will only be able to be hit by the player if the player explicitly presses the melee button

429.name: ForceScanForEventsThisFrame
429.rockstarCodeComment: Disable timeslicing of event scanning this frame (see url:bugstar:2100836 for an example situation where this is useful)

430.name: StartProjectileTaskWithPrimingDisabled
430.rockstarDescription: Set this flag to disable priming when the projectile task starts up until the attack trigger is released and pressed again

431.name: CheckFPSSwitchInCameraUpdate
431.rockstarDescription: Set if we want to perform a second AI/anim update when switching between first person/third person

432.name: ForceAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft
432.rockstarDescription: Force ped to auto-equip a helmet om entering aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft (set in the interaction menu)
432.rockstarCodeComment: Forces ped to auto-equip a helmet when entering an aircraft. Overrides PCF_DisableAutoEquipHelmetsInAicraft which is set in the interaction menu.

433.name: BlockRemotePlayerRecording
433.rockstarDescription: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).
433.rockstarCodeComment: Flag used by replay editor to disable recording specified remote players (for url:bugstar:2218297).

435.name: UseFirstPersonVehicleAnimsIfFPSCamNotDominant
435.rockstarDescription: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant
435.rockstarCodeComment: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

436.name: ForceIntoStandPoseOnJetski
436.rockstarDescription: puts the ped in a standing pose on the jetski
436.rockstarCodeComment: allow FPS vehicle anims even if FPS camera isn't dominant

437.name: InAirDefenceSphere
437.rockstarDescription: Ped is located inside an air defence sphere.

438.name: SuppressTakedownMeleeActions
438.rockstarDescription: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)
438.rockstarCodeComment: This will suppress all takedown melee actions (RA_IS_TAKEDOWN or RA_IS_STEALTH_KILL, defined in action_table.meta)

439.name: InvertLookAroundControls
439.rockstarDescription: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player, for this frame.
439.rockstarCodeComment: Inverts lookaround controls (right stick / mouse) for this player

440.name: IgnoreCombatManager
440.rockstarDescription: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers).
440.rockstarCodeComment: Allows attacking ped to engage another entity without waiting for its turn (if there's multiple attackers)

441.name: UseBlendedCamerasOnUpdateFpsCameraRelativeMatrix
441.rockstarDescription: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.
441.rockstarCodeComment: Check if there is an active camera blending and use the blended camera frame when compute the FPS camera relative matrix.

442.name: ForceMeleeCounter
442.rockstarDescription: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.
442.rockstarCodeComment: Forces the ped to perform a dodge and a counter move if it's attacked.

443.name: WasHitByVehicleMelee
443.rockstarDescription: Indicates that ped was hit by vehicle melee attack.

444.name: SuppressNavmeshForEnterVehicleTask
444.rockstarDescription: Dont allow ped to use navmesh when navigating in TaskEnterVehicle
444.rockstarCodeComment: Suppress navmesh navigation in TaskEnterVehicle. Will use gotopoint or bail if cant use that

445.name: DisableShallowWaterBikeJumpOutThisFrame
445.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents the ped from jumping out of the vehicle in shallow water if the bike is submerged

446.name: DisablePlayerCombatRoll
446.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents the player from performing a combat roll.

447.name: IgnoreDetachSafePositionCheck
447.rockstarDescription: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped
447.rockstarCodeComment: Will ignore safe position check on detaching the ped

448.name: DisableEasyLadderConditions
448.rockstarDescription: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.
448.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents the more forgiving MP ladder detection settings from being used, and forces SP settings.

449.name: PlayerIgnoresScenarioSpawnRestrictions
449.rockstarDescription: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag
449.rockstarCodeComment: Makes local player ignore certain scenario spawn restrictions on scenarios that respect this flag

450.name: UsingDrone
450.rockstarDescription: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC
450.rockstarCodeComment: Indicates player is using Drone from Battle DLC

451.name: ForceWantedLevelWhenKilled
451.rockstarDescription: Will force the player that killed this ped to get wanted level, even if he wouldnt otherwise

452.name: UseScriptedWeaponFirePosition
452.rockstarDescription: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines
452.rockstarCodeComment: Will use scripted firing position on the clones of this ped on other machines

453.name: EnableCollisionOnNetworkCloneWhenFixed
453.rockstarDescription: Enable collision on player ped network clones when physics is fixed

454.name: UseExtendedRagdollCollisionCalculator
454.rockstarDescription: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions
454.rockstarCodeComment: Use extended logic for determining damage instigator for ragdoll collisions

455.name: PreventLockonToFriendlyPlayers
455.rockstarDescription: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players
455.rockstarCodeComment: Prevent the player locking on to friendly players

456.name: OnlyAbortScriptedAnimOnMovementByInput
456.rockstarDescription: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input
456.rockstarCodeComment: Modifies AF_ABORT_ON_PED_MOVEMENT to only trigger an abort when movement would be caused by player input

457.name: PreventAllStealthKills
457.rockstarDescription: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped
457.rockstarCodeComment: Prevents stealth take downs from being preformed on a ped

458.name: BlockFallTaskFromExplosionDamage
458.rockstarDescription: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage
458.rockstarCodeComment: Prevent peds from entering a fall task if affected by explosion damage

459.name: AllowPedRearEntry
459.rockstarDescription: Mimics the behaviour like with boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats
459.rockstarCodeComment: Mimics the behaviour of boss peds by holding the button for entering the rear seats
